data.Title: Google Releases June 2024 Spam Update
data.Description: Google has released a new spam update targeting websites that engage in spammy practices. The update is expected to impact search rankings and could take up to a week to fully roll out.

data.Title: Google's AI Overviews See Reduced Frequency in Search Results
data.Description: A new study finds Google is reducing the frequency of, but lengthening, AI overviews in search results.

data.Title: Google Search Experiencing Indexing Issues
data.Description: Google Search is experiencing an indexing issue affecting websites of all sizes, including major publications like The Wall Street Journal, The New York Times, and CNN.

data.Title: Google Clarifies Return Policy Markup Precedence
data.Description: Google has clarified that product-level return policy markup overrides organization-level return policy markup in search results.

data.Title: Google Warns Against Using JavaScript for Structured Data in Merchant Center
data.Description: Google's Rike Levering cautions against using JavaScript for structured data with Google Merchant Center, highlighting potential quality and inconsistency issues.

data.Title: Google Tests Display of "Top-quality Store" and "Shop Rating" Labels Together
data.Description: Google is experimenting with showing both the "Top-quality store" and "shop rating" labels simultaneously within the same search result snippet.

data.Title: Google's AI Overviews Impact E-commerce SEO
data.Description: Google’s AI Overviews (AIOs) has disrupted eCommerce, forcing online retailers to rethink their search strategies.

data.Title: Google Search Image Thumbnails Disappear for Some Sites
data.Description: Websites experiencing the disappearance of their image thumbnails from Google Search snippets are likely facing quality issues rather than technical problems, according to Google's John Mueller.

data.Title: Exploit Allows Manipulation of Google Maps Listings
data.Description: A Google Maps exploit has surfaced, enabling individuals to manipulate competitor listings by moving their map pins, potentially leading to ranking drops and even business suspensions.

data.Title: Sudden Indexing Spikes and Drops in Google Search Console Explained
data.Description: Glenn Gabe's latest blog post addresses concerns about sudden indexing fluctuations in Google Search Console, explaining that these spikes and drops might not necessarily indicate SEO problems.

data.Title: Technical SEO Skills Can Lead to Significant Salary Increase
data.Description: Proficiency in technical SEO, website performance analysis, and analytics configuration is a highly sought-after skill set that can boost salaries for SEO professionals by up to $35,000.

data.Title: Google's "Circle to Search" to Add Audio Search Functionality
data.Description: Google is reportedly working on expanding its "Circle to Search" feature to include audio-based search, allowing users to search for information based on sounds they hear.

data.Title: The Trade Desk Restricts Access to Yahoo's Video Inventory
data.Description: The Trade Desk has cut off open marketplace access to Yahoo’s video inventory in an ongoing dispute over how inventory is represented.
